commits.author: Christian Moen
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Test a few common katakana spelling variations. *

* English translations are as follows: *

    *
  • copy
    • *
  • coffee
    • *
  • taxi
    • *
  • party
    • *
  • party (without long sound)
    • *
  • center
    • *
* Note that we remove a long sound in the case of "coffee" that is required. *

*/ public void testStemVariants() throws IOException { assertAnalyzesTo(analyzer, "コピー コーヒー タクシー パーティー パーティ センター", new String[] { "コピー", "コーヒ", "タクシ", "パーティ", "パーティ", "センタ" }, new int[] { 0, 4, 9, 14, 20, 25 }, new int[] { 3, 8, 13, 19, 24, 29 }); }
